title: "Australia wins first AI Eurovision Song Contest by sampling koalas and kookaburras"
excerpt: "A team of programmers and songwriters from Australia have won the inaugural (and unofficial) AI Eurovision Song Contest, using a neural network trained on noises made by koalas, kookaburras, and Tasmanian devils to help score their winning entry."
